name: Deep Web Defineline(深网防线)
description:
介绍

欢迎来到深网防线！

在这里，一波又一波的病毒/木马侵袭着你的电脑。你将使用杀毒工具筑造而成的防御塔，利用不同的升级卡牌增强你的防御网体系，抵御病毒们的侵袭！

目前有三种防御塔可供选择，你可以通过组合他们，探索出多种不同的防御策略（甚至可以只用一个防御塔通关！）目前仅支持中文版本。

操作说明

右侧栏：选择防御塔

卡牌：增强防御塔

点击防御塔可以查看防御塔的强化情况，面板左侧的撤销按钮可以移除当前放置的防御塔

如果没有合适的卡牌，可以花费25点数进行洗牌

Intorduction

Welcome to the Deep Web Defineline!

Here, wave after wave of viruses/Trojans invade your computer. You will use anti-virus tools built into the defense tower, using different upgrade cards to enhance your defense network system, resist the invasion of the virus!

Here, wave after wave of viruses/Trojans invade your computer. You will use anti-virus tools built into the defense tower, using different upgrade cards to enhance your defense network system, resist the invasion of the virus!

Operations

Right column: Select the defense tower

Cards: Improved defense tower

Click the defense tower to view the reinforcement of the defense tower, and the undo button on the left side of the panel can remove the currently placed defense tower

If you don't have the right cards, you can spend 25 points to shuffle
